title: The Hindu: Centre owes ₹6,366 crore in MGNREGA wages to 18 States and Union Territories
selftext: On our way to a $5 Trillion Economy?
comments: Question is- do they have the money, or are they going to raise taxes on some sectors?
Yes, they have the money. But it's  for 2024 elections and campaigns.
